tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ManufacturingEmissions(
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   process_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   emission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   emission_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
   emission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  emission_quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  process_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  product_id INT,
  emission_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Plants (
    plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    plant_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    carbon_emission FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Process_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_id INT NOT NULL,
    process_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    emission_amount FLOAT NOT NULL,
    emission_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Emission_Reduction_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    reduction_goal FLOAT NOT NULL,
    reduction_deadline DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Companies(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Company (
    ID INT,
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    Location VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (ID)
)

CREATE TABLE Product (
    Product_ID INT,
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    Type VARCHAR(50),
    Manufacturing_Company_ID INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (Product_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Manufacturing_Company_ID) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Company(ID)
)

CREATE TABLE Emissions (
    Emission_ID INT,
    Product_ID INT,
    CO2_Emissions DECIMAL(10, 2),
    Date_Recorded DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (Emission_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Product_ID) REFERENCES Product(Product_ID)
)

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Process (
    Process_ID INT,
    Product_ID INT,
    Process_Name VARCHAR(100),
    Energy_Consumption DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (Process_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Product_ID) REFERENCES Product(Product_ID)
)

CREATE TABLE Employee (
    Employee_ID INT,
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    Department VARCHAR(100),
    Manufacturing_Company_ID INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (Employee_ID),
    FOREIGN KEY (Manufacturing_Company_ID) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Company(ID)
)
